rook.api.transport.simple

Class SimpleUnicastTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • rook.api.transport.simple.SimpleUnicastTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnicastTransport

    public class SimpleUnicastTransport
extends Object
implements UnicastTransport
    Generic implementation of a UnicastMessage that provides logic to manage and dispatch messages to consumers. It uses a Publisher implementation to send events to the process's Router.
    Author:
    Eric Thill

        public void incognito_send(RID from,
                           RID to,
                           GrowableBuffer msg)
        Description copied from interface: UnicastTransport
        Send a unicast message as any service. This method is intended to be used by services that are able to connect multiple routers into a single environment.

        Parameters:

        to - The service to send the message to
        msg - The message
